layer.name: Responsibility
layer.definition: If it's in your life, it's yours to address.

answers.4: my responsibility, though I don't always act on it
answers.2: hard to improve given my situation
answers.3: partly my responsibility, partly limited by what I'm working with
answers.1: limited by my genetics and circumstances

questions.text: My physical condition is limited by ...

answers.4: mostly my choices, though some constraints are real
answers.5: my choices — I work with what I have
answers.2: circumstances that make it hard to stay consistent
answers.3: real constraints, but also my choices within them
answers.1: lack of time, resources, and equipment

answers.4: my responsibility, though I often settle for good enough
answers.2: limited by my age, body type, or situation
answers.3: something I'd like, but I've mostly settled for where I am
answers.1: not realistic given where I'm starting from

questions.text: My body's ability to function is mostly determined by ...

answers.4: my choices, though genetics and age play a role
answers.2: factors I didn't choose and can't change much
answers.3: some genetics, some choices — hard to separate

questions.text: When I face physical limitations, I ...

answers.4: work to improve, though some feel fixed
answers.5: work within them and push to improve where possible
answers.2: work around them, but they define what's possible
